247wallst.com/2015/04/natural-gas-price-.snippet: The U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) reported Thursday morning that U.S. natural gas stocks increased by 90 billion cubic feet for the week ending April 17. Analysts expected a storage injection (increase) of 86 to 90 billion cubic feet.
